casebody.data:
January 16, 1950.*

Per Curiam Decisions.

No. 472. Horn et al. v. Chicago.

Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the consideration or decision of the cases in which judgments or orders were this day announced.

 Per Curiam:

The motion to dismiss is granted and the appeal is dismissed for want *941of jurisdiction. 28 U. S. C. § 1257 (2). Treating the papers whereon the appeal was allowed as a petition for writ of certiorari as required by 28 U. S. C. § 2103, certiorari is denied.

Lloyd Lanham for appellants. Benjamin S. Adamowski, L. Louis Karton and Arthur Magid for appellee.
